article_text:
Connecticut Old Pitney Bowes HQ Gets Overhaul

A real estate private-equity firm is investing $30 million to renovate the former world headquarters of Pitney Bowes Inc. in Stamford, Conn.

Building & Land Technology said it aims to appeal to tenants in the technology and creative sectors by overhauling the 1980s office building and giving it the name Silicon Harbor. I.M. Pei & Partners, now called Pei Cobb Freed & Partners...
